title: A Little Princess
attributes: The book is an expansion of the short story "Sara Crewe: or, What Happened at Miss Minchin's".

title: Helter Skelter: The True Story of the Manson Murders
attributes: Vincent Bugliosi was the prosecutor on the Charles Manson case.

title: The Radium Girls: The Dark Story of America's Shining Women
attributes: Kate Moore did extensive research for the book, visiting the homes and graves of some of the women affected.
